评论详情: I would give 5 stars but I have had them only for 2 hours. I have not felt anything in my feet for over 20 years. Today there is feeling there all the way up through my calf.  My feet are very narrow Lots of extra lace. Over all I am delighted

评论概述: Amazing! Such a great shoe for winter!
评论详情: These shoes are great! Very flexible! Warm!!!!! And they stay dry after having snow on them! I'm in love with this shoe! So comfy! Perfectly wide and flexible! I'm just hoping they last more then a year..
These shoes are very comfortable. I am wearing them ever day to work and my feet are not tired at the end of the day. I will definitely order these shoes in different colors.

I have worn these for one day. It’s a cold day and my feet are very comfortable. I walked through some snow and slush and my feet stayed dry and the shoes stayed clean. To be clear these are barefoot shoes son wearing socks will make them too tight on your feet. However the cozy soft faux fur feels great. I have also noticed I don’t feel the cold transfer through the soles like my other cover priced barefoot shoes.
I can wear these all day. They keep my feet warm.  My feet don’t ache after walking with them all day.  Gonna order some air conditioned ones for summer/golf.
The tabs that secure shoestring in place broke when I tried to snug them a little.  Also, the sole of the shoe is loose and moves when I walk causing the heel yo inch up above the heel
I love these boots. They bend in a natural way so that I feel safe as I negotiate snowy sidewalks.  They are warm and fuzzy inside too.

The shoes are very comfortable, warm, true to size and work as advertised but not grounding. The price point makes them well worth the try to relieve back and leg pain. It took a couple of weeks of wearing to work but they do relieve pain.

Bought these wanting comfort as I worked outside on my job. Hesitated to try out my first day back after a few days off and a new snow. So happy I wore them that Friday. No heavy lift like most boots as I go back and forth from my vehicle to front porches. Easy to get on and off. Warm and cozy, but not that cramped closed in feeling on your feet. Felt like I have more control of my stepping and safer footing.
Nice looking comfortable and I like the color.

Exactly the stylish bootI was looking for! These boots are so comfortable and lightweight. The color was just as pictured. There is plenty of room in the toe box as well as throughout the boot, but they can be tightened with the elastic laces for a tighter fit. These are great for a quick trip out the door, or running around outside. So far, they have been waterproof for me, seem to be well built and look like they are going to last.
I like these boots. The color, fit, laces, weight are all good. I got a half size larger and they are fine-room for socks. But they are not Hikes. I'll buy some real ones if these work out.

True to size, warm, need to wear with socks as the insole will move with a bare foot- no problem when wearing socks. If you like the summer edition- you will like these ( was almost zero out and my feet were fine)

评论概述: Love them!! True to size, soft and comfy inside. Great little  boot
评论详情: Lightweight,  warm, easy to get on and off. Really nice casual snow boot . I appreciate everything about them including the price! Would definitely purchase again.
they were at least 2 sizes too big. the 2nd pair (Christmas gift) still has not arrived

These are the best winter barefoot shoes ever!, starting with the most important, being able to feel the contour of the earth beneath my feet in Wisconsin winter, is a joy! I feel more connected to the earth, and it feels like getting a foot massage! Secondly, they are warm, comfortable on the foot, and they keep your feet dry!!!

评论概述: Good value, but order one size up.
评论详情: Quite comfortable, easy on and off.  Seem to be well made so a decent value.  BUT order one full size up.
never knew barefoot technology could be so warm and comfortable!!

I bought 2 pairs of these~ 1 for my Mother, & 1 myself. These supposed shoes described for comfort , neuralgia, & other positive effects including certain pain, did not provide anything they they advertised. The “lace in one shoe that is used to as an elastic to tighten them broke the second time I wore them. The definitely didn’t help my Mother’s severe preferel neragial syndrome _ so both pairs were a waste of of money.
Replaced with elastic laces that are minimally adjustable necessitates using a shoe horn and some tugging to get on …0nce on warm comfortable and dry … but don’t stand in a puddle
Roomy, warm, flexible, but some padding on the soles.  You can feel the ground, but softly.  Love them
They keep your feet warm and they are very comfortable
Just what I was looking for at a reasonable price.

评论概述: Comfortable and warm shoes for winter
评论详情: Love my summer Hike shoes, so decided to try a winter pair. Ordered a half size larger so that I could wear heavy socks with them They fit well and are warm when outside for long periods of time. The toe design allows my feet to stretch and flex like being barefoot which is great for older feet that tend to start stiffening up.

What I didn't like, is that the shoes were a lot longer than the size I usually buy, but the over all shoe fit was tighter.  I needed it larger around the ankle and instep but to my surprise it was smaller than the 10s I usually buy. I wanted looser so I could wear socks. They are only much longer! The result is I feel I'm wearing skis and I still can't wear socks!

I bought these to wear at the Christmas Markets in Europe.  Being for an extremely hot and humid climate, I was worried about freezing in the much colder temperatures.  These kept my feet warm and toasty.  They took a while to get used to because of the barefoot aspect - you can feel the road more, if that makes sense, so you feel cobblestones as if you're walking in socks but it doesn't hurt - but once I did, these became my go-to shoes for being out and about.  They are super lightweight, too, so easy to pack.
Shoes were too big and too hard to put on. I have a couple pair of standard ones and love them.
Thin sole, can be slick when wet but they are warm
These boots are so comfy and warm! I love them.

This was a present for my sister. she has been having issues with her legs and feet. Hard for her to walk very far. These shoes seem to have made a difference.  She is much more stable wearing these shoes said it feels like she is barefoot!

I bought a pair of these for both my husband and myself for our daily two mile walks around our small town. So far they are warm and cozy and hold up in light rain. The flat foot walking takes some getting used to but we have no discomfort adjusting to it. I would not recommend only wearing these shoes all the time. Sometimes arch support and more cushioning is a good thing! I bought the extra inserts as they are pretty thin and you can feel rocks etc through the soles. (I can't imagine they would be good for hiking.,) We also have found that if any surface is near freezing you will slip. They aren't too pretty but serve a purpose for easy on warm mild weather walks until the snow flys. Sizing was accurate.
Haven't had boots/shoes this comfy in a long, long time!
These boots are very comfortable.  They are now my “go to” footwear.  The only downside is the insole is not glued down so they don’t stay in place.

评论概述: Warm ,cozy and nice with across  the toes
评论详情: I first  purchased  a blue pairs  and loved them  ! They  are not only very  comfortable  but they look  good on my feet. They are wide acrossthe toe and very warm inside.  My boss even liked them  so I  ordered  a black  pair  and a Grey pair

I wear them to work every day… Standing on my feet or walking around the store… I absolutely love them and would highly recommend them for anyone with tired old feet… So far I have 2 pairs but plan on getting many, many more. Most comfortable shoes I have ever worn in my 76 years of life!!

评论概述: The string end gizmo is missing on the right shoe.
评论详情: Features.
Tight for barefoot shoes. A little extra toe room than traditional boots.  I will keep them for the price.

I previously ordered these boots in a 7.5, since I was allowing extra room for lining and socks.  But that size was much too big. I returned the boots which was quick and easy. And I reordered size 7 which is my true size. The boots arrived today! They fit my feet perfectly!  I love the khaki color. The boots are so comfortable. I will try wearing them outside tomorrow. But so far I love them...😊Update: I wore the boots outside...my feet stayed warm in 20 degrees weather!
These fit great!  Super comfortable,  so glad I got them.  They will be great for colder weather.
Good material, fit perfect
These are a great buy, very comfortable and warm
It’s a gift to my mom. The shoes are comfortable and water-proofed. I also want to get one pair for myself then.

评论概述: Easy to get on and off
评论详情: shoes felt great. Feet have room to move naturally, just like bare feet. Order one size up from your normal order. If you wear 9's get the 10's.
I like the way the summer barefoot shoes fit, but the thick lining made these hard to get on my foot since I have a high instep. I think once they have been worn a few times they should be fine.
